input_text:
Job Title: Assembly A

Location: Cincinnati, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
L3Harris is dedicated to recruiting and developing diverse, high-performing talent who are passionate about what they do. Our employees are unified in a shared dedication to our customers’ mission and quest for professional growth. L3Harris provides an inclusive, engaging environment designed to empower employees and promote work-life success. Fundamental to our culture is an unwavering focus on values, dedication to our communities, and commitment to excellence in everything we do.

About L3Harris Technologies: 

L3Harris Technologies is an agile global aerospace and defense technology innovator, delivering end-to-end solutions that meet customers’ mission-critical needs. The company provides advanced defense and commercial technologies across space, air, land, sea and cyber domains. L3Harris has approximately $18 billion in annual revenue and 47,000 employees, with customers in more than 100 countries.

Job Description: 

Responsible for performing a wide variety of electronic or electro-mechanical assembly operations which may include skilled hand work or utilizing automated production equipment. Comprehends and interprets a variety of technical specifications, terms and documents. Determines and/or follows methods and sequence of operations in performing wiring, component installation, hand soldering and cable harnessing on assembly units. Makes setups and adjustments holding tolerances to blueprint specifications.

Essential Functions: 

Ability to read and understand description of manufacture (DM, DOM) for operation assembly instruction. Ability to handle small parts with tweezers and/ or special tools Operate various types of assembly equipment (assembly machines, press stakers, air screw drivers, etc.) with proper training. Visually inspect components and subassemblies for obvious defects prior to, during, and after assembled. Check completed assemblies for conformance with quality standards and DMs. Maintain assembly/ quality records paperwork as required.

Qualifications: 

High School Diploma or GEDAbility to obtain a Security Clearance if required


Preferred Additional Skills:

Experience with various types of precision measurement tools (micrometers, go/no-go gauges, etc) and blueprint reading required.Experience in a manufacturing assembly environment.Experience working on Surface Mount Technology (SMT) Lines.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Assembly A
job_responsibilities: Performs a wide variety of electronic or electro-mechanical assembly operations
Determines and/or follows methods and sequence of operations
Performs wiring, component installation, hand soldering, and cable harnessing
Makes setups and adjustments holding tolerances to blueprint specifications
Reads and understands description of manufacture (DM, DOM) for operation assembly instruction
Handles small parts with tweezers and/or special tools
Operates various types of assembly equipment
Checks completed assemblies for conformance with quality standards
output_json.company_information: L3Harris Technologies is an agile global aerospace and defense technology innovator, delivering end-to-end solutions that meet customers’ mission-critical needs.
